author: sandakith
msg: fixing the axis2 eclipse codegen plugin nightly builds,
resolving the issue that meven2 including timestamp jars in to the distribution.

author: dblevins
msg: Added single-line logging for all parts of the protocol: ejb, jndi, auth.  Log lines are output to debug.
Added full toString methods to all the Request Response objects as well as EJBMetaDataImpl and ThrowableArtifact
Added support for sending an exception back with a denied auth request.
Added support for setting the realmName in an InitialContext

author: pbenedict
msg: STR-2020: Explain that NPE is caused by missing ActionServlet

author: dblevins
msg: Allow deployment-id to be optional in an openejb-jar.xml.  Fill in a default value just as we would when they have no <ejb-deployment> declaration at all.

author: jdillon
msg: Bring the vfs and scripting commands back to life, as well as the testsuite
